extendedInfo.description: DStvYour ultimate guide to DStv which features new self-service and payment functionality. With all the latest highlights, news and a full 10 day schedule. Select your favourite channels, set reminders for shows and share what you watch on social networks. View your account balance, make a payment or update your customer details with self-service. Planning your viewing and managing your account couldnât get simpler.REMINDERSSet reminders on your Android device for any show, movie or sporting event.GUIDEView the guide for the next ten days. Â· Sort your channels according to country, genre, DStv bouquet or your selected favourite channels. Â· Set reminders for events on your Android device. Â· Fully searchable guide.NEWSKeep up-to-date with all the latest entertainment news from DStv.com. Â· Share it with your friends on social networks.HIGHLIGHTSCheck out the daily highlights so you know what you shouldnât be missing.SOCIALShare what you watch with your friends on social networks.SELF-SERVICEManage your accountÂ· View account and customer detailsÂ· Update your profileÂ· Clear error codesÂ· View transaction historyÂ· Contact Customer Care*Not available in all countries*PAYMENTÂ· Payments can be made using an electronic wallet account*Not available in all countries*

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Great app. Useful for when im not at home. But what would be great is to add a feature to insert our smart card number, and integrate with the decoder to record programs when we arent at home. Give that some thought developers.
reviews.author: Jason Absmeier

reviews.title: Does what it says
reviews.comment: Could use some MAJOR improvement.  Loads of devices have IR blasters, adding a option to use your phone as a remote would change this 2 to a 5. Highlights are pretty lame aswell.
reviews.author: Stefan Glintzer

reviews.title: Nice screen but........
reviews.comment: It\'s like everything else that DSTV has to offer......looks nice but only works when it wants to. No reminders and when I access it, it\'s just \"Loading......\". If you have the time and patience, download it.
reviews.author: George van der Merwe

reviews.title: Could be so much more
reviews.comment: Introduce the ability to schedule a recording from the app to my PVR. That way I won\'t miss anything in case I forgot to set a recording for a show.
reviews.author: Thomas Prinsloo

reviews.title: App doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: Except for the highlights and features everything else gets stuck then it crashes - uninstalled
reviews.author: Graham Thompson

reviews.title: Very Good App
reviews.comment: It\'s a very good app. You don\'t need to go on the website now. Every thing you need from the website is now available on the app.
reviews.author: Felix Sam Osakonor

reviews.title: It hangs on my HTC one X+
reviews.comment: More than 50% the app fails to run.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent, no really.. But
reviews.comment: The app is nice,  I like it;  Now why don\'t I get notifications or something for all  my reminders? And my secondly,  why is weekend programming not accurate (shows weekdays schedule, no matter how many times I reload)? And I have realised it\'s not only me, so #call for an #update fix already....
reviews.author: Sabelo Makhanya

reviews.title: ALMOST GOOD
reviews.comment: The one thing I would like the program to do is help reactivate the account since getting the customer service person is a uphill task, but since it can\'t then its half useful and half useless but it would be nice if that functionality was added
reviews.author: Yakov Adegboyenko

reviews.title: THE REMINDERS DO NOT WORK.
reviews.comment: It\'s a visually pleasing app and the tv guide seems accurate. But what\'s the use of a tv guide app when the program reminders set by a user don\'t work? I\'ve missed a number of viewing after the app failed to remind me, checking days later I could still see the reminders I set waiting for something to trip them  off.
reviews.author: Tope Adelowo

reviews.title: No good
reviews.comment: Keep getting stuck. FORCE CLOSE ALL THE TIME! Cant even get past save south africa.
reviews.author: Bonny M

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: One of the best ways to  find programs
reviews.author: Letitia de Lange

reviews.title: Horrible.
reviews.comment: Fix ire dam app time schedules are wrong it never loads rather just send me the magazine cause obviously there\'s no intention to fixing this problem for over 4 months. Delete
reviews.author: Robin Mathew

reviews.title: Not working at all
reviews.comment: I have never been able to retrieve any information. Get the message \'unable to connect... try again later\' Does not work on Samsung Galaxy Note 10.1
reviews.author: Basil Forssman

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: Funny its not working
reviews.author: Klint Modesto

reviews.title: If only it worked
reviews.comment: This app is very nice and has potential but I find it very unreliable. Sometimes it just will not refresh.
reviews.author: Nicholas Young

reviews.title: King frm Nigeria
reviews.comment: I use this app alot, but it needs more improvement especially on the reminders part which should include time. The reminder is unreliable.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Lekker App
reviews.comment: I looooove it,simple n user friendly,way to go dstv.Keep up the good work!
reviews.author: Tshepo Malatse

reviews.title: Very interesting
reviews.comment: Good
reviews.author: Amofa Samuel

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Well i downloaded this app and its good. You must also try it for a better change when not at home.
reviews.author: Daniel Hofland-Scatt
